.

HELPING OUR HEROES

HOH is a platform which offers contemporary, high-quality products of utility, like apparels and accessories, for sale. Part of the proceeds of these sales are donated directly to supporting our nation's heroes.

We built an ecommerce website with about us, categories page for men and women, fully responsive for cross-platforms. We also included Blogs for SEO.

It had a backend panel where user can upload new products along with images.



http://helpingourheroes.com/
